name: oci_field_name
purpose: Returns the name of a field from the statement

return.description: Returns the name as a string, or FALSE on errors.

notes.description:
In PHP versions before 5.0.0 you must use ocicolumnname instead.
    This name still can be used, it was left as alias of
    oci_field_name for downwards compatability.
    This, however, is deprecated and not recommended.
